name: atlas-dca
description: Atlas Debt Collection Agency Management System

scripts.dev:all: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ml-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
